text: Say goodbye to the enemy's bottom barracks. <small>''followup''</small>

text: Your bottom barracks have fallen. <small>''followup''</small>

text: Your top barracks have fallen. <small>''followup''</small>

name: mk_ann_rax_fall_follow_up_01
text: You know what they say about a team that loses its barracks.
text_simple: you know what they say about a team that loses its barracks

name: mk_ann_rax_fall_follow_up_02
text: How can I take them seriously after that?
text_simple: how can i take them seriously after that

name: mk_ann_rax_fall_follow_up_03
text: That's one way to go about losing.
text_simple: thats one way to go about losing

name: mk_ann_rax_fall_follow_up_04
text: Are they even paying attention?
text_simple: are they even paying attention

name: mk_ann_rax_fall_follow_up_05
text: They're just giving this away.
text_simple: theyre just giving this away

name: mk_ann_rax_fall_follow_up_06
text: Well, at least the view's unobstructed.
text_simple: well at least the views unobstructed

name: mk_ann_rax_fall_yr_follow_up_01
text: There's nothing heroic about that.
text_simple: theres nothing heroic about that

name: mk_ann_rax_fall_yr_follow_up_02
text: So what are you gonna do about it?
text_simple: so what are you gonna do about it

name: mk_ann_rax_fall_yr_follow_up_03
text: I've come back from worse.
text_simple: ive come back from worse

name: mk_ann_rax_fall_enm_follow_up_01
text: That should demoralize them.

name: mk_ann_rax_fall_enm_follow_up_02
text: I suppose they had it coming.

text: If your Ancient falls, consider me unimpressed.

name: mk_ann_mega_now_follow_up_01
text: On the bright side, fighting creeps just got more intense.

name: mk_ann_mega_now_follow_up_02
text: But you better smash that Ancient before they do.

name: mk_ann_cour_kill_follow_up_01
text: Delightful.

name: mk_ann_cour_kill_follow_up_05
text: Perhaps they'll graduate to killing heroes next.
text_simple: perhaps theyll graduate to killing heroes next

name: mk_ann_cour_kill_follow_up_02
text: Not a proper kill, but not without merit.
text_simple: not a proper kill but not without merit

name: mk_ann_cour_kill_follow_up_03
text: What was that courier doing there, anyway?
text_simple: what was that courier doing there anyway

name: mk_ann_cour_kill_follow_up_04
text: Noble creatures, couriers. Entrusted with treasures that would bankrupt most kingdoms.

name: mk_ann_rosh_fallen_dire_01
text: Roshan has fallen to the Dire.

name: mk_ann_rosh_fallen_dire_02
text: Roshan goes about this immortality thing all wrong.
text_simple: roshan goes about this immortality thing all wrong

name: mk_ann_rosh_fallen_dire_03
text: Roshan's dead. Not exactly a tragedy.

text: Roshan has fallen to the Radiant.
text_simple: roshan has fallen to the radiant

name: mk_ann_rosh_fallen_rad_02
text: An Aegis grants something of a second-rate immortality, if you ask me.
text_simple: an aegis grants something of a secondrate immortality if you ask me

name: mk_ann_rosh_fallen_rad_03
text: Old Roshan'll be back. Not sure how long it'll be, though. Always so difficult to say.

name: mk_ann_victory_rad_02
text: Radiant claim the victory! I had a feeling.

name: mk_ann_victory_rad_03
text: The Dire Ancient falls! Radiant have done it!

name: mk_ann_negative_event_01
text: Only a fool would tolerate this aggression!
text_simple: only a fool would tolerate this aggression

name: mk_ann_negative_event_02
text: What kind of hero are you, anyway?
text_simple: what kind of hero are you anyway

name: mk_ann_negative_event_03
text: Do something, worm!
text_simple: do something worm

name: mk_ann_negative_event_04
text: Do I really need to explain this?
text_simple: do i really need to explain this

name: mk_ann_negative_event_05
text: I'd never allow such insolence!
text_simple: id never allow such insolence

name: mk_ann_negative_event_06
text: Are you even listening to me?
text_simple: are you even listening to me

name: mk_ann_negative_event_07
text: This reminds me of my encounter with -- Hrm. Another time, perhaps. When you've earned it.
text_simple: this reminds me of my encounter with hrm another time perhaps when youve earned it

name: mk_ann_negative_event_08
text: Are you even paying attention?
text_simple: are you even paying attention

name: mk_ann_negative_event_end_01
text: This isn't some game!
text_simple: this isnt some game

name: mk_ann_negative_event_end_02
text: Those don't come back, you know.
text_simple: those dont come back you know

name: mk_ann_negative_event_end_03
text: Did you even try to deny it?
text_simple: did you even try to deny it

name: mk_ann_negative_event_end_04
text: It's ok. Towers make you weak. You don't need them.
text_simple: its ok towers make you weak you dont need them

name: mk_ann_negative_event_end_05
text: Trees grow back. Towers don't.
text_simple: trees grow back towers dont

name: mk_ann_negative_event_end_06
text: Remember how I was saying they were under attack?
text_simple: remember how i was saying they were under attack

name: mk_ann_negative_event_end_07
text: Oh, this reminds me of my encounter with -- oh. Another time, perhaps. When you've earned it.
text_simple: oh this reminds me of my encounter with oh another time perhaps when youve earned it

name: mk_ann_negative_event_end_08
text: If you're trying to make it a challenge, it's working.
text_simple: if youre trying to make it a challenge its working

name: mk_ann_negative_event_end_09
text: That's certainly never happened to me.
text_simple: thats certainly never happened to me

name: mk_ann_negative_event_end_10
text: It's not over, but you're not helping yourself.
text_simple: its not over but youre not helping yourself

name: mk_ann_negative_event_end_12
text: Can't say I didn't see it coming.
text_simple: cant say i didnt see it coming

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_01
text: Following in my legendary footsteps.
text_simple: following in my legendary footsteps

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_02
text: What'll you smash next?
text_simple: whatll you smash next

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_03
text: There's no denying your minor accomplishment. Well done.
text_simple: theres no denying your minor accomplishment well done

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_04
text: Go on, gloat a little.
text_simple: go on gloat a little

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_05
text: Well played!
text_simple: well played

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_06
text: You'll be drinking and singing victory songs in no time.
text_simple: youll be drinking and singing victory songs in no time

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_07
text: Smashing!
text_simple: smashing

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_09
text: That's one way to do it.
text_simple: thats one way to do it

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_10
text: It took you long enough.
text_simple: it took you long enough

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_11
text: Ready for the ancient yet, or you just going to loiter about until something happens?
text_simple: ready for the ancient yet or you just going to loiter about until something happens

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_12
text: Push the advantage -- crush your enemy!
text_simple: push the advantage crush your enemy

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_13
text: Hmm. Things just got a bit easier, eh? Meh.
text_simple: hmm things just got a bit easier eh meh

name: mk_ann_positive_event_end_15
text: Can we end this now? I've admirers waiting.

name: mk_ann_item_purchase_01
text: You need wards to see hidden demons?
text_simple: you need wards to see hidden demons

name: mk_ann_item_purchase_02
text: Don't waste those -- they're expensive.
text_simple: dont waste those theyre expensive

name: mk_ann_item_purchase_05
text: Wards? You can support me anytime.
text_simple: wards you can support me anytime

name: mk_ann_item_purchase_06
text: Look at this charming devil, buying all these wards.
text_simple: look at this charming devil buying all these wards

name: mk_ann_item_purchase_03
text: It's a pretty good rapier. I don't know that I'd go so far as to call it divine.
text_simple: its a pretty good rapier i dont know that id go so far as to call it divine

name: mk_ann_item_purchase_04
text: That's mine! Or else a forgery.

name: mk_ann_respawn_01
text: So how does that whole dying thing work, anyway?
text_simple: so how does that whole dying thing work anyway

name: mk_ann_respawn_02

name: mk_ann_idle_01
text: So which story about me do you like best?
text_simple: so which story about me do you like best

name: mk_ann_idle_02
text: So when is this going to get interesting?
text_simple: so when is this going to get interesting

name: mk_ann_idle_03
text: I was trapped in a rock for 500 years. I know boring when I see it.
text_simple: i was trapped in a rock for 500 years i know boring when i see it

name: mk_ann_idle_04
text: How about all 10 heroes go Radiant, I go Dire? No, better make it 20 heroes.
text_simple: how about all 10 heroes go radiant i go dire no better make it 20 heroes

name: mk_ann_idle_05
text: This is the clash to decide the fate of the world? I've seen better.
text_simple: this is the clash to decide the fate of the world ive seen better

name: mk_ann_idle_06
text: Someone put my name back in that book and kill me!
text_simple: someone put my name back in that book and kill me

name: mk_ann_idle_07
text: You do realize there's an Ancient to smash, yes?
text_simple: you do realize theres an ancient to smash yes

name: mk_ann_unpause_01
text: Back to the fight!
text_simple: back to the fight

name: mk_ann_unpause_02
text: Finally! What were we waiting for?
text_simple: finally what were we waiting for

name: mk_ann_unpause_03
text: I tip my staff to the player who paused, but let's get on with it!
text_simple: i tip my staff to the player who paused but lets get on with it

name: mk_ann_unpause_04
text: Hopefully that was the last of that.
text_simple: hopefully that was the last of that

name: mk_ann_quit_01

name: mk_ann_quit_02
text: What kind of hero quits before it's over?
text_simple: what kind of hero quits before its over

name: mk_ann_quit_04

name: mk_ann_quit_05
text: You can't undo this.

name: mk_ann_disconnect_01
text: A player disconnected.
text_simple: a player disconnected

name: mk_ann_disconnect_02
text: That player dropped. Pause maybe?

text: Someone's techno-wizardry just fizzled.
text_simple: someones technowizardry just fizzled

name: mk_ann_disconnect_06
text: For once I'm in favor of a pause.

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_01
text: Who shall fight for your cause?
text_simple: who shall fight for your cause

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_02
text: Throw some fur into the wind.
text_simple: throw some fur into the wind

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_03
text: Captain's mode or not, I'm the boss.
text_simple: captains mode or not im the boss

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_04
text: I make my own fate. What of you?
text_simple: i make my own fate what of you

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_05
text: Too scared for actual Captain's Mode?
text_simple: too scared for actual captains mode

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_06
text: So when you die, you come back as...someone else?
text_simple: so when you die you come back as someone else

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_07
text: A lot of good choices here. Only one legendary monkey warrior, though.
text_simple: a lot of good choices here only one legendary monkey warrior though

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_08
text: Defeat them with their own choices.
text_simple: defeat them with their own choices

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_09
text: A classic throwdown.
text_simple: a classic throwdown

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_10
text: Only one opponent? Maybe do it left-handed.
text_simple: only one opponent maybe do it lefthanded

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_11
text: A draft? Can't we just get to the fighting?
text_simple: a draft cant we just get to the fighting

name: mk_ann_type_follow_up_12
text: It almost doesn't matter who you pick, so let's go.
text_simple: it almost doesnt matter who you pick so lets go

name: mk_ann_welcome_01
text: Welcome to Dota. <small>''followup''</small>
text_simple: welcome to dota smallfollowupsmall

name: mk_ann_welcome_02
text: And now, the Monkey King's Special Presentation of: The Battle of the Ancients! <small>''followup''</small>
text_simple: and now the monkey kings special presentation of the battle of the ancients smallfollowupsmall

name: mk_ann_welcome_03
text: Well, well. You've returned. Good show. <small>''followup''</small>
text_simple: well well youve returned good show smallfollowupsmall

name: mk_ann_welcome_04
text: Good. You're here. Now we can get on with it. <small>''followup''</small>
text_simple: good youre here now we can get on with it smallfollowupsmall

name: mk_ann_welcome_05
text: The Monkey King welcomes you, noble warrior. <small>''followup''</small>
text_simple: the monkey king welcomes you noble warrior smallfollowupsmall

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_brood_01
text: You insist on torturing me.
text_simple: you insist on torturing me

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_brood_02
text: Just for that, I hope you lose.
text_simple: just for that i hope you lose

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_phantom_lancer_01
text: If I couldn't be myself, I might choose Azwraith as well.
text_simple: if i couldnt be myself i might choose azwraith as well

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_phantom_lancer_02
text: You know you've made it when they start impersonating you.
text_simple: you know youve made it when they start impersonating you

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_phantom_lancer_03
text: Oh, the fabulous Monkey Ki-- Wait! That's not me!
text_simple: oh the fabulous monkey ki wait thats not me

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_razor_01
text: Never trust a gaoler.
text_simple: never trust a gaoler

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_slark_01
text: There's a slippery fellow. After my own heart.
text_simple: theres a slippery fellow after my own heart

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_arc_warden_01
text: Nothing I hate worse than an overeager Warden.
text_simple: nothing i hate worse than an overeager warden

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_alchemist_01
text: These two got cell mates? Unfair!
text_simple: these two got cell mates unfair

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_not_mk_01
text: That's not the Monkey King. Are you trying to lose?
text_simple: thats not the monkey king are you trying to lose

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_not_mk_02
text: No Monkey King? Was that a misclick?
text_simple: no monkey king was that a misclick

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_not_mk_03
text: Do you even know what you're doing? The right pick was Monkey King!
text_simple: do you even know what youre doing the right pick was monkey king

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_not_mk_04
text: You should have picked the Monkey King. But you've got spirit to defy me.
text_simple: you should have picked the monkey king but youve got spirit to defy me

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_is_mk_01
text: They'll be telling this story for 10,000 years!
text_simple: theyll be telling this story for 10000 years

name: mk_ann_hero_selection_is_mk_02
text: Get ready for the greatest ride of your life!
text_simple: get ready for the greatest ride of your life
